description: Anthropomorphic pigs are depicted in a domestic living room setting. One pig is comfortably seated in an armchair, reading a book and wearing glasses, while another pig stands behind, observing. A third pig engages in a telephone conversation using a rotary phone placed on a nearby table. A framed portrait of three pigs hangs on the wall, reinforcing the surreal domesticity. The conversation includes a disgusted reaction to "huffing and puffing," creating a dark, absurd irony by juxtaposing this phrase, familiar from the Big Bad Wolf tale, with the pigs' seemingly safe and mundane environment.
caption: "Disgusting! ... It's just a sort of heavy huffing and puffing."
